) sub ) WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) < to_date

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sub.*, rownum AS rnum FROM( SELECT lc.*, u.company_name company_name, u.credit_grade credit_grade FROM lease_calls lc JOIN users u ON lc.user_id=u.user_id
WHERE u.company_name LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '%')||'%'
WHERE lc.lease_comment_title LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '%')||'%'
WHERE lc.address LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '%')||'%' OR comment_content LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '%')||'%'
WHERE lc.lease_category LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '%')||'%' OR lc.equipment_category LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '%')||'%'
ORDER BY u.credit_grade DESC ) sub ) WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) < to_date
